data.title: Drammen attractions map, Norway
data.meta_description: Find landmarks, attractions and places in Drammen, Norway to plan the trip of your dream
data.text:
Public Transport

Public transportation in Drammen is efficient and reliable, with options including buses and trains. Buses are a popular mode of transport, connecting various parts of the city with frequent services. The price for a single journey is around 35 NOK, and schedules can be easily accessed online or at bus stops. The train service in Drammen is operated by Vy, offering connections to major cities like Oslo and Bergen. Prices and schedules for trains can also be found on their website.

Main Transportation Hubs

- Drammen Station: Located in the city center, Drammen Station is a major transportation hub connecting commuters to various destinations. Trains and buses operate from this station. - Drammen Bus Terminal: Situated close to the city center, the bus terminal serves as a primary point for local and regional bus services.

Rental Services

ðŸš— Car Rental: Visitors can rent cars from popular providers like Hertz, Avis, and Sixt in Drammen. Prices for car rentals typically start from 300 NOK per day. ðŸš² Bicycle Rental: For a more eco-friendly way to explore the city, bicycle rental services are available in Drammen. Providers like Sykkelbua offer rentals starting from 100 NOK per day.
